title: Ombudsman (Amendment) Act 2025 (No. 3 of 2025), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Financial Services and Pensions
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Financial Services and Pensions 

Ombudsman (Amendment) Act 2025 (Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited financial service pension ombudsman (amendment) act 2025 (commencement) order 2025

title: Ombudsman (Amendment) Act 2025 (No. 3 of 2025), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 9th day of May 2025 is appointed as the day on which the Financial
text_raw:
2. The 9th day of May 2025 is appointed as the day on which the Financial 
Services and Pensions Ombudsman (Amendment) Act 2025 (No. 3 of 2025) 
shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 May, 2025. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [171] 3
